prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a rocky appearance and aquatic features.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a prehistoric fish, with a sturdy shell and fins.
Generate a creature that has a blend of earthy tones and a streamlined body.
Make a unique Pokemon inspired by ancient marine life, with visible scales and fins.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in ocean environments, showcasing a rugged exterior.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the essence of deep-sea exploration with a solid form.
Show me a water-type Pokemon that has a combination of gray and brown colors.
